title: Portrait of a Lady
description: A portrait painting by American Impressionist artist Mary Cassatt, known for her paintings of women and children. This work demonstrates her mastery of light and color in the Impressionist style.
exhibition_history: Women Artists in America, 1976; Impressionist Masters, 1990
text: Mary Cassatt was one of the few American artists to be associated with the French Impressionist movement. This portrait showcases her ability to capture the personality and grace of her female subjects, often depicting them in intimate, everyday moments.
